column4: ï»¿i just noticed my system doesnt like it when i do suspend. so now i was fixing my partitions using "sudo fsck -y -t ext3 /dev/xxxx"
worked well on all partitions but one where I get bla blabla "Bad magic number in super-block while trying to open /dev/xxxx"
well, the "magic number" is used to identify file types/filesystems, etc.
